task.title: Attaching Existing Files
task.shortdesc: Files that already exist, either on disk or at a URL can be attached to a message with just one line of code, using Swift_Attachment::fromPath().

context.p: You can attach files that exist locally, or if your PHP installation has allow_url_fopen turned on you can attach files from other websites.

step.cmd: Add the attachment to the message with attach().

result.p: The attachment will be presented to the recipient as a downloadable file with the same filename as the one you attached.
